name: The Experiments of Dr. Bits
description:
A quirky first person puzzle game with head bending dual input elements.

Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Stick

Look - Mouse / Right Stick

Jump - Space / A or X (controller)

Made in about 30 hours for Full Moon Game Jam - Theme : Duality

https://itch.io/jam/full-moon-game-jam

Mac & Linux builds untested
